date: Mon Jun 13 2022 22:17:56 GMT+1000 (Australian Eastern Standard Time)
pageTitle: Jennifer Hudson wins the grand slam of entertainment
description: The musician, actor and producer is the newest member of US entertainment's grand slam after winning an Emmy, a Grammy, an Oscar and now a Tony award.
metaDescription: The musician, actor and producer is the newest member of US entertainment's grand slam after winning an Emmy, a Grammy, an Oscar and now a Tony award.
topicText:
Jennifer Hudson joins EGOT winners after Tony victory
The musician, actor and producer is the newest member of US entertainment's grand slam after winning an Emmy, a Grammy, an Oscar and now a Tony award.
Jennifer Hudson Becomes an EGOT Winner at the 2022 Tony Awards
“A Strange Loop” received a record 11 Tony nominations including Best Musical and Best Actor. The show, written by Michael R. Jackson, won the Tony Award for ...
Jennifer Hudson makes history by becoming 'EGOT' winner
Jennifer Hudson has won a Tony, meaning that she has an Emmy, a Grammy and an Oscar to go with the collection of awards: the singer turned actress is ...
Jennifer Hudson has just reached EGOT status. Here are the awards ...
Jennifer Hudson is the latest celebrity to win the four big artistic awards: an Emmy, Grammy, Oscar, and Tony.
Jennifer Hudson reaches EGOT status after first Tony win
The 40-year-old actress-and-singer won her first Tony Award for 'A Strange Loop', which scooped Best Musical at Sunday night's (12.06.22) ceremony at New York's ...
Jennifer Hudson achieves EGOT status after Tony Award win
The actress and singer served as a producer for A Strange Loop, which won best musical at the 75th annual ceremony in New York. EGOT status refers to ...
Another EGOT winner is born: Jennifer Hudson snags Tony Award
MANILA, Philippines – Singer-actress Jennifer Hudson brought home her first Tony Award on Sunday, June 12, for her stellar co-production of the broadway ...
